product_name: Black Diamond Compactor Adjustable Ski Poles - Pair
long_description: Great for light touring, splitboarding and travel, the Black Diamond Compactor adjustable ski poles are versatile four-season aluminum poles that fold into an ultra-compact package for easy storage.
short_description: Great for light touring, splitboarding and travel, the Black Diamond Compactor adjustable ski poles are versatile four-season aluminum poles that fold into an ultra-compact package for easy storage.
